charge_type.source: Count 1 against the 1st defendant, So So has pleaded guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine with Fu, the defendant of 316/2023, and other persons unknown, between two dates, 1 and 2 October 2021 in Hong Kong.

drugs.source: She had in her bag 87 plastic bags containing a total of 23.05 grammes of a solid containing a total of 20.44 grammes of cocaine.

roles.source: She then proceeded to make deliveries as instructed all over Kowloon and New Territories.

mitigating_factors.source: The 1st defendant of 317/2023, So, was 15 at the time of her arrest and is now 19 years old.

After the trial for Fu had been set down, So gave a statement to the police, implicating Fu and agreeing to give evidence against him in his trial. It was this new development that prompted Fu to change his plea and indicate a plea of guilty.
I have received a letter in mitigation and evidence of her further recent vocational training to set herself up in employment in the future.

guilty_plea.source: The 1st and 2nd defendant of 317/2023 pleaded guilty to their respective charges at the earliest opportunity and were committed to the Court of First Instance for sentence to be dealt with after the trial of their co-accused, the defendant of 316/2023 who had pleaded not guilty.

starting_point.source: For the 1st defendant, So, I will take into account the drugs found on her in her bag and that was 20.44 grammes of cocaine. Now according to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 20.44 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 5 years and 9 months imprisonment.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: For the 1st defendant, So, I will take into account the drugs found on her in her bag and that was 20.44 grammes of cocaine. Now according to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 20.44 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 5 years and 9 months imprisonment.

final_sentence.source: Therefore, for 317/2023, Count 1 against the 1st defendant, So, I intend to take a starting point of 5 years and 9 months and I will reduce it to 3 years imprisonment. This reflects a discount of about 48 per cent.

charge_type.source: Count 2 against the 2nd defendant only, Lam Lam has pleaded guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine and cannabis in a herbal form with Fu, the defendant of 316/2023, and other persons unknown between 22 September and 3 October 2021, both dates inclusive, in Hong Kong.

drugs.source: I will take into account the cocaine found on him and the cocaine found in the premises rented by Fu and Lam which totals 109.19 grammes of cocaine.

They searched the premises and found 41 plastic bags containing a total of 7.2 grammes of a solid containing 6.19 grammes of cocaine and two plastic bags containing a total of 6.12 grammes of cannabis in herbal form.

roles.source: He was to take it back to the subdivided unit in Mongkok and repackage the drugs into smaller bags. They searched the premises and found ... a tenancy agreement dated 23 September 2021 signed by Fu and the 2nd defendant, Lam, of 317/2023.

mitigating_factors.source: The 2nd defendant of 317/2023, Lam, was 18 at the time of these offences and still is a student in a vocational education course.

guilty_plea.source: The 1st and 2nd defendant of 317/2023 pleaded guilty to their respective charges at the earliest opportunity and were committed to the Court of First Instance for sentence to be dealt with after the trial of their co-accused...

starting_point.source: According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 109.19 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 9 years and 7 months imprisonment.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 109.19 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 9 years and 7 months imprisonment.

final_sentence.source: Therefore, for 317/2023, ... Count 2 against the 2nd defendant, Lam. I intend to take a starting point of 9 years and 6 months' imprisonment and reduce it by 38 months to reflect his plea at the earliest opportunity. Lam is sentenced to 6 years and 4 months' imprisonment.

charge_type.source: Count 1 against the defendant, Fu Fu now pleads guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine with So and Lam and other persons unknown between 1 and 2 October 2021 in Hong Kong.

drugs.source: For Fu, there is 20.44 grammes of cocaine he admits he delivered to So in relation to the 1st count he faces.

roles.source: Apart from messages with So, the police found a WhatsApp group in Fus mobile showing members of the WhatsApp group sending out instructions of customers, their drug order, the price to pay and location of delivery. It would appear that he had made deliveries as well.

mitigating_factors.source: Fu of 316/2023 was also 18 at the time of these offences. Fu was also still a student and I granted him bail to give him a chance to complete his HKDSE examinations and support his mother whilst she received chemotherapy treatment for cancer.
I granted him bail to give him a chance to complete his HKDSE examinations and support his mother whilst she received chemotherapy treatment for cancer.

guilty_plea.source: Before his trial, this defendant reconsidered in light of the additional evidence against him and indicated a plea. He has pleaded guilty before me today and admitted the Summary of Facts.

starting_point.source: For Fu, there is 20.44 grammes of cocaine he admits he delivered to So in relation to the 1st count he faces. In relation to the 2nd count, which is not conspiracy but trafficking, there was 6.19 grammes of cocaine found in those rented premises. As far as he is concerned, I can quantify a total of 26.63 grammes of cocaine. According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 26.63 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 6 years and 3 months imprisonment.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 26.63 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 6 years and 3 months imprisonment.

final_sentence.source: Therefore, for 316/2023, Count 1 against Fu. I intend to take a starting point of 6 years and 3 months' imprisonment and I will reduce it by 23 months. This represents a discount of just over 30 per cent. Fu is sentenced to 4 years and 4 months' imprisonment for Count 1.

charge_type.source: Count 2 Fu now pleads guilty to trafficking in dangerous drugs on 3 October 2021 in Room F, 3rd Floor, 59 Prince Edward Road West, Mongkok, Hong Kong, he unlawfully trafficked in 7.2 grammes of a solid containing 6.19 grammes of cocaine and 6.12 grammes of cannabis in herbal form.

drugs.source: They searched the premises and found 41 plastic bags containing a total of 7.2 grammes of a solid containing 6.19 grammes of cocaine and two plastic bags containing a total of 6.12 grammes of cannabis in herbal form.
They searched the premises and found ... two plastic bags containing a total of 6.12 grammes of cannabis in herbal form.

roles.source: After his arrest, Fu revealed a drug storage premises in Mongkok to the police. The police obtained a search warrant and visited that location. They used keys found on Fu to gain access to the premises. It was a subdivided unit with a toilet, kitchen and a bed.

mitigating_factors.source: Fu of 316/2023 was also 18 at the time of these offences. Fu was also still a student and I granted him bail to give him a chance to complete his HKDSE examinations and support his mother whilst she received chemotherapy treatment for cancer.
I granted him bail to give him a chance to complete his HKDSE examinations and support his mother whilst she received chemotherapy treatment for cancer.

guilty_plea.source: Before his trial, this defendant reconsidered in light of the additional evidence against him and indicated a plea. He has pleaded guilty before me today and admitted the Summary of Facts.

starting_point.source: According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 26.63 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 6 years and 3 months imprisonment.

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: According to the latest sentencing guidelines, those trafficking in 26.63 grammes of cocaine would attract a mathematical starting point of 6 years and 3 months imprisonment.

final_sentence.source: For Count 2, I take the same starting point as Count 1 and reduce it by the same discount, 23 months. For Count 2, this defendant is sentenced to 4 years and 4 months' imprisonment.
